DOC.brief_title: Sphenopalatine Block Epidural Bloodpatch Post Dural Puncture Headache : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Recently sphenopalatine block emerge alternative epidural blood patch post dural puncture headache investigator know significant efficacy compare epidural blood patch . Method : randomized clinical trial patient moderate severe post dural puncture pain randomly receive either sphenopalatine block epidural blood patch . Pain relief pain low intensity pain main outcome . Pain recurrence , survival without pain side effect ( tinitus , low back pain , new dural puncture , sore throat ) secondary outcome .
